then.sys:
*Move mouse* or use *A,D* keys to position the pick and *left click* when the lock is positioned under a tumbler to activate it

 After discovering the first loose tumbler, you need to figure the correct sequence

 The next correct tumbler is always directly left or right from the latest you activated

 The lock will reset if you activate a tumbler in the wrong sequence. *Right click* if you want to give up
